summary: PASSENGER AIR BAG RECALL WAS FIXED BUT AIR BAG LIGHT IS STILL BLINKING. DEALER SAYS PROBLEM IS NOW WITH DRIVER SIDE. DEALER SAYS WE MUST PAY TO HAVE IT ANALYZED AND THEN PAY FOR WHAT EVER IS WRONG WITH IT.  TO ME AN AIRBAG IS AN AIRBAG NO MATTER WHAT SIDE. TV NEWS SHOWS DRIVER SIDE AIRBAGS BLOWING UP. IT SHOULD BE A RECALL AS WELL.
